show_title: Burr, Betrmint, and a rewards reshuffle: GM Farcaster ep275 Wednesday, August 6, 2025
text:
"GET $BETR TOGETHER" for 40m $BETR

Rules:
- You have until Monday, August 4th, to submit a VERTICAL video (can hide your face) - enjoy a boost on the leaderboard also!
- Quote cast this cast with "GET $BETR TOGETHER"
- Cross post on X for bonus points! Be sure to tag @betrmint 

Please include:
- What do you want to get BETR at?
- Why do you want to get BETR?
- How are you going to get BETR
- Who can possibly help you get BETR

The top 15 on the Karma leaderboard (on Aug. 4th) will be able to nominate a finalist.

@toadyhawk.eth, @netnose, Burr and celebrity guest judge @nounishprof will choose 4 winners from the nominations!

Each winner will win 10m $BETR üèÜ

Burr and Toady will also be awarding $tipn to all entries!  Some say Toady may be unhinged with noice also.

Winners will be announced on /gmfarcaster live on Wednesday, August 6th.

Let's get BETR together ü§ç

show_title: Burr, Betrmint, and a rewards reshuffle: GM Farcaster ep275 Wednesday, August 6, 2025
text:
excited to announce that next week, szn 2 of @tipn kicks off, and the token that will be flying all over the timeline this time will be $BETR!

we have been working with @niftytime.eth and @kompreni for a few weeks on this and have allocated a 1B token grant to the tipn treasury so that their trusted allocators can help distribute more $BETR and grow our communities in tandem. üí™ 

additionally, anyone who is a member of the BETR Believers (holders of 50M+ $BETR) at the time of the upcoming snapshot will be automatically added to the list of allocatooors and given an allowance of $BETR to tip out when this goes live next week. ü´° 

Today Is Probably Notable.

text:

Tag us with your entries below so we don‚Äôt miss them, and LFG (let‚Äôs fking glow!)

cast.text:
NEON ART IS NOICE üü™üé®

We‚Äôre teaming up with @noiceapp  and the /yellow collective to keep the NEONCHAIN Summer vibes glowing with a week-long celebration of art and over $1,000 in $noice and $betr tips + prizes up for grabs!

üö® Calling all Creatives:

üü£ Create a piece of neon aesthetic art in any style or medium, inspired by @betrmint and @noiceapp 

üü£ Post it in /betr with the caption: ‚ÄúNEON ART is NOICE!‚Äù

üü£ @burrrrrberry, @netnose and I will be tipping $500+ worth of $noice and $betr to standout entries all week

üü£ Deadline: Thursday at 12PM EST, when we‚Äôll select the top 3 entries. 

‚∏ª

üèÜ Top Prize:
Featured in Friday‚Äôs official NEONCHAIN Summer BETRMINT round
‚Üí Includes ETH Creator Rewards + a 50M $BETR grant & 1 Yellow Collective Noun NFT

üèÖ 2 Runners-Up:
$50 in $noice + $50 in $betr each + 1 Yellow Collective Noun NFT 


LFG, we can‚Äôt wait to see all your noice & neon art!


@noicebot distribute 350K $BETR to everyone who likes and recasts this cast. Budget 55M $BETR

show_title: Burr, Betrmint, and a rewards reshuffle: GM Farcaster ep275 Wednesday, August 6, 2025
text:
** Rewards Leaderboard Results **

Looks like we have 4 first-time top 10s...

* @marlo takes #1, sharing some modeling lore & a narrow escape from a bad scene; @erica takes #2 and can buy Pear a friend for 2 weeks while she is gone; speaking of animal friends, @bertwurst.eth survived abandonment and clocked in at #3

* @clfx.eth went higher to #4 (first top 10); and @jake at #6 is his first top 10; And at #9 @accidentalboymom is first time entry

* After many #11s & 12s early on, it's nice to see karma reverse & put @keccers.eth on a run in the top 10

* Down leaderboard @adrienne returns to top 30 after a long hiatus (tough for big accounts); & everyone's favorite funny man @wong at #27

* Meme-coveted #69 goes to @lambchop 

* 7 months in, it's still fun to see first-time rewards winners excited for $3 or $5 and cast about it. Let's celebrate with them üéà

show_title: Burr, Betrmint, and a rewards reshuffle: GM Farcaster ep275 Wednesday, August 6, 2025
text:
Creator Rewards Update

Farcaster is changing our rewards program to match how the Base rewards program works. Casts posted from the Farcaster app will count towards Farcaster rewards points while casts posted from the base app will count towards Base's rewards system. ‚Ä®‚Ä®‚Ä®

What if I use Recaster or some other Farcaster app?

If you are an indie or early-stage team building on the Farcaster protocol, we will include casts from your app in the rewards program. 

Why are we doing this? ‚Ä®‚Ä®

Base‚Äôs new creator rewards program gives out rewards only for casts from the Base app. As of today, Farcaster gives out rewards to any casts posted from any app. 

We think a fair approach is for each client to incentivize users to participate in their app. Users benefit from competition between apps, and can choose which one they want to participate in.

text:
There are already some AI agents on @baseapp.base.eth and I‚Äôm sure more are coming with rich, varied features.

who‚Äôs going to be the next breakout?  üëÄ

show_title: Burr, Betrmint, and a rewards reshuffle: GM Farcaster ep275 Wednesday, August 6, 2025
text:
‚Äú1 billion people accessing an open financial system.‚Äù

^ Pin it to your door and keep going.

cast.text:
It will always be a spectrum, not a sudden moment in time.

But one goal I‚Äôve had for a long time (what I frequently write down) is I want to get to 1B people accessing an open financial system through our products every day.

When we do this, I feel like getting to 50% of the global population would be possible as a next step.

It could ‚Äúfeel‚Äù like a sudden moment in retrospect, like the iPhone moment, or Netscape moment. I think the first truly breakout superapp will be that moment (hopefully it is Base app).

show_title: Burr, Betrmint, and a rewards reshuffle: GM Farcaster ep275 Wednesday, August 6, 2025
text:
It took us years, but we finally fixed Web3 governance.

@davinci-vote, the new @vocdoni's zkRollup-based voting protocol is now live as @farcaster Miniapp üí•

üÜì No gas fees to cast a vote
üõ°Ô∏è Onchain-grade security with settlement on @ethereum 
‚ú® Anonymous, flexible voting, anticoercion, results encrypted until the end

All the stuff everyone complains about in blockchain governance?
‚úÖ Solved.

cast.text:
üì¢ New miniapp drop!

We just launched a miniapp powered by the @davinci-vote zkRollup-based voting protocol, and to kick things off, we‚Äôre doing a quadratic test vote with the legendary @thehaberdashery DAO.

üó≥Ô∏è If you hold one of their NFTs, you can vote by signing in with the wallet where you keep them.

This new miniapp brings onchain equivalent voting to @farcaster with a gasless experience and some powerful features:

ü•∑ Anonymous voting
üõ†Ô∏è Multiple voting methods (simple, quadratic, multiple choice, etc.)
üìä Encrypted results until voting ends
üõ°Ô∏è Coercion-resistant
üîó Final settlement on @ethereum 

Let‚Äôs put it to the test, vote and share your thoughts!

https://app.davinci.vote/vote/0x00aa36a774d8967e812de34702ecd3d453a44bf37440b10b0000000000000004

show_title: Burr, Betrmint, and a rewards reshuffle: GM Farcaster ep275 Wednesday, August 6, 2025
text:
yes! this! 

if you study sports betting pre-2018, the UX was optimized for insiders (math-heavy, weird acronyms, no standardization)

post-2018, the UX shifted to serve *everyone* which helped supercharge adoption (in addition to legalization) esp for younger, mobile-first users

same could happen with onchain content

cast.text:
Counterpoint: ‚Äúnormie creators‚Äù are not meant to grok it initially 

It‚Äôs a paradigm shift into attention markets and early adopters must enjoy the excess financialization

You can‚Äôt compete with incumbents via marginal improvements (eg. payments onchain) ‚Äî you have to do something bold that leverages crypto fully

show_title: Burr, Betrmint, and a rewards reshuffle: GM Farcaster ep275 Wednesday, August 6, 2025
text:
Counterpoint: ‚Äúnormie creators‚Äù are not meant to grok it initially 

It‚Äôs a paradigm shift into attention markets and early adopters must enjoy the excess financialization

You can‚Äôt compete with incumbents via marginal improvements (eg. payments onchain) ‚Äî you have to do something bold that leverages crypto fully

cast.text:
a bear thesis for creator coins is that crypto as a subculture and/or cb/zora as platforms have not done nearly enough to educate normie creators on why they should do one in a way that does not feel extractive or scammy.

some questions that one might answer:
- what do you do with your coin once created?
- how do you safely exit without burning your audience (e.g. LPing)
- how are they not extractive? how do you sell that to your audience?
- what are examples of creators that have done this well?

the decision to launch one is the function of one person asking themselves "are the vibes right" before they hit that button. and sans the above, my guess is that the vast majority of good creators will say no.
